titles.title: A bill to provide for the inclusion of the Washington Square area within Independence National Park, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.
Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 100-704.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 7/21/1987--Introduced. Includes Washington Square within the Independence National Historical Park in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
